issue.description:
Goal: a small pixel-art lobster mascot on desktop that reflects a local Clawdbot instance state (thinking/tool/error/idle).

Notes:

* Plugin side: expose a minimal state stream derived from Gateway WS events (agent lifecycle/tool events).
* Client side: lightweight desktop app that subscribes and plays animations.
* Must be world-class UX: onboarding, usage, progress/feedback, docs coverage, persistence.

MVP:

* Connect to ws://127.0.0.1:18789 with gateway token
* Listen to event:"agent" lifecycle and map to {idle,thinking,tool,error}
* Pixel lobster window (always-on-top optional) + 3-4 animations
